name: BulkDataExport
description: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.

properties.name: BulkDataExport
properties.short: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.
properties.definition: User specific configuration for the Medplum application.

properties.name: id
properties.definition: The logical id of the resource, as used in the URL for the resource. Once assigned, this value never changes.

properties.name: meta
properties.definition: The metadata about the resource. This is content that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

properties.name: implicitRules
properties.definition: A reference to a set of rules that were followed when the resource was constructed, and which must be understood when processing the content. Often, this is a reference to an implementation guide that defines the special rules along with other profiles etc.

properties.name: language
properties.definition: The base language in which the resource is written.

properties.name: requestTime
properties.definition: Indicates the server's time when the query is requested.

properties.name: transactionTime
properties.definition: Indicates the server's time when the query is run. The response SHOULD NOT include any resources modified after this instant, and SHALL include any matching resources modified up to and including this instant.

properties.name: request
properties.definition: The full URL of the original Bulk Data kick-off request. In the case of a POST request, this URL will not include the request parameters.

properties.name: requiresAccessToken
properties.definition: Indicates whether downloading the generated files requires the same authorization mechanism as the $export operation itself.

properties.name: output
properties.definition: An array of file items with one entry for each generated file. If no resources are returned from the kick-off request, the server SHOULD return an empty array.

properties.name: type
properties.definition: The FHIR resource type that is contained in the file.

properties.name: url
properties.definition: The absolute path to the file. The format of the file SHOULD reflect that requested in the _outputFormat parameter of the initial kick-off request.

properties.name: deleted
properties.definition: An array of deleted file items following the same structure as the output array.

properties.name: type
properties.definition: The FHIR resource type that is contained in the file.

properties.name: url
properties.definition: The absolute path to the file. The format of the file SHOULD reflect that requested in the _outputFormat parameter of the initial kick-off request.

properties.name: error
properties.definition: Array of message file items following the same structure as the output array.

properties.name: type
properties.definition: The FHIR resource type that is contained in the file.

properties.name: url
properties.definition: The absolute path to the file. The format of the file SHOULD reflect that requested in the _outputFormat parameter of the initial kick-off request.

searchParameters.name: status
searchParameters.description: The name of the access policy
